name: Gridlock (swordfishgames)
description:
Gridlock is a high-octane local PvP game for two players. The game sees both players on a 5x5 grid facing each-other as they sling spells, laser blasts, and traps at their opponent.

If inputs seem to stop working reload the page, additionally try to avoid clicking outside of the game window

if issues persist, ask on our discord server
